attributes.action: bring in a law, forget the human rights farce, to ensure that all sex offenders, persons who carry out unprovoked attacks which result in the victim being murdered,paedophiles, rapists, continual offenders who are never properly reprimanded, to be made to join the army and be sent straight to afghanistan so that they can experience exactly what it is like to be feel real fear and be in life threatening situations. At the moment it is decent people being killed whereas the yobs/hooligans/criminals are having a right laugh at the british justice system which gives preferential treatment to the criminal. At least then the majority of the scum will be taken off our streets and cannot complain about being bored. Bring back conscription for these yobs.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

rejection.details: A similar petition is already in existence, please see http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/timeforachange/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
